channel.title: CVE Feed for dFactory -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for dFactory -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1994|2024-04-06T01:54:50.208Z -- dfactory -- Image Watermark
item.description: The Image Watermark plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the watermark_action_ajax() function in all versions up to, and including, 1.7.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to apply and remove watermarks from images.

item.title: CVE-2024-31264|2024-04-12T12:46:35.660Z -- dFactory -- Post Views Counter
item.description: Unauthenticated Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Post Views Counter <= 1.4.4 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-3230|2024-06-04T05:32:15.260Z -- dfactory -- Download Attachments
item.description: The Download Attachments plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'download-attachments' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 1.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
